project.name: XL
project.description: A multichain memecoin launchpad designed for fair launches—no snipers, creator-first.
project.longDescription: XL is a multichain memecoin launchpad designed for fair launches—no snipers, creator-first. It simplifies token creation and trading, giving users a seamless way to explore and launch new memes across multiple blockchains. The MegaETH testnet deployment is the latest step in expanding its reach.

features.title: Fair Launch System
features.description: No snipers, creator-first approach ensuring fair token distribution.

features.title: Multichain Support
features.description: Launch and trade memecoins across multiple blockchains.

features.title: Simple Token Creation
features.description: User-friendly interface for creating new memecoins.

features.title: Seamless Trading
features.description: Easy-to-use platform for buying and selling memecoins.

project.currentStatus: XL is currently available on MegaETH testnet at alpha-testnet.xl.fun/megaeth

steps.title: Buy and Sell
steps.content: Use XL's intuitive interface to buy and sell memecoins on MegaETH testnet.

steps.title: Create Your Token
steps.content: Follow the simple process to launch your own memecoin on XL's platform.
